translation.en: Oh, well, I'll just have to eat all those pancakes myself then.
translation.it: Allora tutti quei pancake dovrò mangiarli io.

translation.en: Oh, okay. Here, put that on.
Yeah, I miss him too, Bunny.
translation.it: Già, manca anche a me, tesoro.

translation.en: And the blue one I like the most,
'cause he can camouflage in the water, and he has a beanbag to himself.
translation.it: perché può mimetizzarsi nell'acqua e ha un pouf tutto suo.

translation.en: And has only a cushion and a beanbag.
translation.it: Ha solo un cuscino e un pouf.

translation.en: How's work? Oh, it's okay. It's work.
translation.it: - Come va il lavoro? - Diciamo bene. È lavoro.

translation.en: [woman] Okay, I'm just gonna place the probe.
That, Jordie, is a little heartbeat.
translation.it: Questo, Jordie, è un piccolo battito cardiaco.

translation.en: [woman] No. You better not be doing what I think you're doing.
translation.it: Spero che tu non stia facendo quello che penso.

translation.en: To my party, is Joan coming?
Uh, what makes you think that Joan might be there?
translation.it: Cosa ti fa pensare che possa esserci Joan?

translation.en: Isn't it a bit hard to miss somebody if you've never met them?
translation.it: Non è un po' strano, dato che non la conosci?

translation.en: I miss people I've never met all the time.
translation.it: Mi mancano sempre le persone che non conosco.

translation.en: You're so cute. I love you.
Uh, it's probably just escaped from someone's backyard.
But she was sitting here, waiting for me.
translation.it: Ma era seduto qui ad aspettarmi.

translation.en: -Ah, it's pouring a gale out there. -[woman] Come in, come in.
I just picked him up from his dad's. He didn't want to leave.
translation.it: L'ho preso da suo padre. Non voleva venire.

translation.en: Um, she's coming straight from work. She'll be here soon.
translation.it: Ci raggiunge dal lavoro. Arriverà presto.

translation.en: [woman] I'm gonna have to put posters up.
Or you could let her keep it.
Well, I saw all the boxes.
-When I went to check on the kids. -Hmm.
I hope you'll tell me if you're ever… not good.
translation.it: Spero che tu me lo dica, se mai dovessi… non stare bene.

translation.en: Maybe we should just cut the cake.
I'm so sorry. She's-- She's two minutes away. I'm so sorry. I'm really, really sorry about this.
translation.it: Mi dispiace. Arriva tra due minuti. Mi dispiace davvero.

translation.en: How are you guys? How's Denise?
We… are trying for a baby.
translation.it: Stiamo cercando di avere un bambino.

translation.en: I thought Mia was gonna be an only child,
translation.it: Pensavo che Mia restasse figlia unica.

translation.en: Well, apart from dinner, nothing. Just--
translation.it: Beh, a parte la cena, niente. Solo…

translation.en: -Hey. -Pete was just telling me the good news.
translation.it: - Ehi. - Pete mi ha dato la bella notizia.

translation.en: It'll be more work, but the pay is fantastic.
translation.it: Lavorerò di più, ma lo stipendio è fantastico.

translation.en: -And, frankly, I was done-- -Oh, no, no. That--
That you guys are trying for a baby.
Mia? It's okay. I'm coming, honey.
translation.it: Mia? Va tutto bene, sto arrivando, tesoro.

translation.en: Toby hit me. What? Are you all right?
translation.it: - Toby mi ha colpito. - Come? Stai bene?

translation.en: Sweetheart, let's see. Here, let me see.
He's only three, Mia. He doesn't understand.
translation.it: Ha solo tre anni. Non capisce.

translation.en: Is that a birthday cake I saw in the kitchen?
translation.it: È una torta quella che ho visto in cucina?

translation.en: Why don't we go and have some cake?
translation.it: Perché non ne mangiamo un po'?

translation.en: Mia, you have fur all over you.
-Can you take this off, please? -[Mia] Don't!
[man on voicemail] This is Sandy McLennan from Warrendi Nursing Home.
translation.it: Sono Sandy McLennan, della casa di riposo Warrendi.

translation.en: Dr. Gregory, we'd like to meet with you to discuss your mother Joan's condition.
translation.it: Dott.ssa Gregory, vorremmo parlarle dello stato di sua madre Joan.

translation.en: Can you please get in touch to arrange a time? Thank you.
-Um, what-- Uh, where is she? -She went out to play. She's with Nowa.
translation.it: - Dov'è? - È fuori a giocare. È con Nowa.

translation.en: You know, you can always tell me if there's someone bullying you, Mia.
translation.it: Lo sai, puoi dirmi sempre se qualcuno ti infastidisce, Mia.

translation.en: Why won't you tell me why you were so upset today, Bunny?
translation.it: Perché non mi dici perché eri così arrabbiata, prima?

translation.en: Mia. I'm your mummy. You know that.
translation.it: Mia. Sono io la tua mamma. Lo sai.

translation.en: All right, Mia. Hop out. Gotta get ready for bed.
translation.it: Su, Mia, esci. Devi prepararti per il letto.

translation.en: Um, can you take that off, please?
[Mia] So we have to put the trunk in the family tree about here.
translation.it: Dobbiamo aggiungere il tronco all'albero genealogico.

translation.en: [Mia] And all the people are the leaves.
translation.it: E tutte le persone sono le foglie.

translation.en: And we went to the funeral.
Uh, she lives very far away.
We need to stick photos in too. How far away?
translation.it: Dobbiamo mettere anche delle foto. Quanto lontano?
- Sì. - Non possiamo fare dei disegni?

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna need them back.
-I don't have any photos of her. -Why not?
translation.it: - Non ho nessuna foto di lei. - Perché no?

translation.en: I haven't seen her in a long time.
translation.it: Non la vedo da molto tempo.

translation.en: I don't stay in touch with her.
Well, that's just the way it is, Bunny.
But I need a photo of Joan.
translation.it: Ma mi serve una foto di Joan.

translation.en: [gasps] Maybe Grandpa had some in his boxes.
translation.it: Forse il nonno ne aveva nelle scatole.

translation.en: -What are you doing out of bed? -It's mine. I've been looking for it.
translation.it: - Cosa fai fuori dal letto? - È mia. La cercavo.

translation.en: No, it's not. Go back to sleep.
-[Mia] It was dark and I couldn't wake up. -I know, Bunny.
translation.it: - Era buio e non riuscivo a svegliarmi. - Lo so.

translation.en: It was just a bad dream.
Did you take this to bed with you?
translation.it: L'hai portata a letto con te?

translation.en: Uh, I don't want you taking things that aren't yours.
translation.it: Non prendere cose che non sono tue.

translation.en: But it is mine. It's me.
[Mia] How do you know it's not me?
translation.it: Come sai che non sono io?

translation.en: Because it was taken before you were born.
translation.it: È stata scattata prima che nascessi.

translation.en: All right. All right, good night--
Sweetheart, you-- Did you hurt yourself?
Did someone at school do this to you?
Is-- Mia, is someone hurting you?
translation.it: Mia, qualcuno ti fa del male?

translation.en: Well, maybe if she sees me, she'll feel better.
translation.it: Forse, se mi vedrà, si sentirà meglio.

translation.en: -No, I don't think so, Bunny. -I want to see Joan.
translation.it: - No, non credo, piccola. - Voglio vedere Joan.

translation.en: I want to see Joan! I want to see Joan!
Shit. Shit. Oh, my God. Shit.
[Mia] I didn't see you hit anything.
translation.it: Non ti ho visto colpire niente.

translation.en: -Why do you need to look for it? -Because it might be injured.
translation.it: - Perché lo cerchi? - Perché potrebbe essere ferito.

translation.en: Uh, you sure you didn't see anything?
translation.it: Sicura di non aver visto niente?

translation.en: Jesus, what? How'd that happen? Here.
[Sandy] I appreciate you coming here. Your mother talks about you.
translation.it: Grazie per essere venuta. Sua madre parla di lei.

translation.en: [Sarah] You said we needed to discuss her condition.
translation.it: Ha detto che avremmo parlato del suo stato.

translation.en: Now, Sarah, I understand that your father hoped temporary care here
translation.it: Sarah, so che suo padre sperava che trascorrere un periodo qui
avrebbe dato a Joan una tregua.

translation.en: What Dad did for Joan was his business.
translation.it: Ciò che ha fatto lui non mi riguarda.

translation.en: Oh, I understand that, and I'm sorry for your loss.
translation.it: Capisco. E le faccio le mie condoglianze.

translation.en: Your dad was a kind man.
I'm afraid it's my responsibility to tell you
that Joan will require ongoing care.
translation.it: che Joan avrà bisogno di cure continue.

translation.en: Uh, I'm sorry. Is this about increased fees?
translation.it: Mi scusi, ma costerà di più?

translation.en: Uh, there are additional costs but--
Uh, you… You have my email.
I didn't need to come in for this. Sorry.
translation.it: Non serviva che venissi qui. Mi scusi.

translation.en: I know that you may have phoned Dad all the time,
translation.it: So che avete sempre telefonato a mio padre,

translation.en: but I've been explicit about limiting necessary contact.
translation.it: ma io avevo scelto di limitare i contatti.

translation.en: I didn't even know he'd put her here until he was dying.
translation.it: Non sapevo nemmeno che lei fosse qui.

translation.en: But, Sarah, this is not simply a matter of administration.
translation.it: Ma, Sarah, non è solo una questione di amministrazione.

translation.en: Your mother has been diagnosed with dementia.
She's been forgetting to wash herself.
She keeps asking for you in moments of lucidity.
translation.it: Nei momenti di lucidità, chiede sempre di lei.

translation.en: -[Sandy] You excited to meet your grandma? -Yeah.
translation.it: - Non vedi l'ora di conoscerla? - Sì.

translation.en: [Sandy] She's had a bit of a rough morning.
Joan, this is Mia, Sarah's daughter.
translation.it: Joan, lei è Mia, la figlia di Sarah.

translation.en: I'm here now. Don't be sad.
translation.it: Ora sono qui. Non essere triste.

translation.en: [crying] Oh, I've missed you so much. So much.
Where have you been? Where have you been?
-You belong to me. -[Sandy] Joan, calm down. Please, Joan.
translation.it: - Tu appartieni a me. - Joan, calmati, per favore.

translation.en: -Let's leave. -[Mia] No, I don't want to!
-[Joan] Don't leave me! -I don't want to go!
-Stop, Mia. We're going. -I don't want to go!
translation.it: - Ora basta. - Alice! Non voglio andar via.

translation.en: -I want to play with Joan. -Let go, please.

translation.it: - Calmati. - Mia, dobbiamo andare. - Subito! - Alice!

translation.en: No! I don't want to go!
-Stop! Stop! -Mia, just let me put your seatbelt on.
translation.it: - Smettila! - Mia, fammi allacciare la cintura.

translation.en: -Mia, put your legs inside. -I want to stay with Joan! -Put your legs in-- -I want to stay with Joan!
translation.it: - Mia, metti le gambe dentro. - Voglio stare con Joan!

translation.en: -Stop kicking me. -No! I want to stay with--
Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
Please, baby. Bunny, let me see. I'm so sorry. I'm sorry. I'm sorry, sweetheart.
translation.it: Ti prego, piccola, fammi vedere. Mi dispiace tanto. Scusami.

translation.en: I know that you might not understand why Mummy is…
translation.it: So che forse non capisci perché la mamma è…

translation.en: Wait. I wanna have a conv--
I said it looks like you've both been in the wars.
translation.it: Ho detto che sembra che siate state in guerra.

translation.en: Yeah. I mean, you know, hard,
given the circumstances, but we're doing okay.
translation.it: date le circostanze, ma stiamo bene.

translation.en: And do you think Mia's coping with the loss of her grandfather?
translation.it: E pensa che Mia stia gestendo la perdita del nonno?

translation.en: Sarah, the school is here to support.
It's clear there's something troubling Mia. That's all.
translation.it: C'è qualcosa che preoccupa Mia. È evidente.

translation.en: Right, well, I-- [sputters] Yes, I did wonder whether she's being bullied.
translation.it: Sì, io… Mi sono chiesta se fosse vittima di bullismo.

translation.en: I think it's something quite different than that.
I've been finding these on the back of her homework.
translation.it: Ne ho trovati diversi sul retro dei suoi compiti.

translation.en: Sarah, I think that Mia is struggling to control her anxiety.
translation.it: Sarah, credo che Mia abbia difficoltà a controllare la sua ansia.

translation.en: Most kids experience anxiety at some time or another.
translation.it: La maggior parte dei bambini prova ansia, prima o poi.

translation.en: You know, things change. The loss of a loved one is difficult.
translation.it: Le cose cambiano. La perdita di un parente è difficile.

translation.en: But I think that Mia may need some extra help.
translation.it: Ma credo che Mia possa aver bisogno di aiuto.

translation.en: Do you have a good family GP?
translation.it: Ha un buon medico di base?

translation.en: Oh, do you mean… professional help?
Sweetheart, do you wanna-- Do you wanna talk about what's been happening lately?
translation.it: Tesoro, ti va di parlarmi di cosa è successo di recente?
Non sei stata la solita Mia.

translation.en: [Mia] I don't think I am myself.
What does-- What does that mean, Mia?
I want you to call me Alice.

translation.it: Il nostro cane sa le parole.

translation.en: -Bunny, you can't draw in library books. -I didn't.
translation.it: - Non si disegna sui libri in prestito. - Non l'ho fatto.

translation.en: Mia, you're not gonna get in trouble if you just tell the truth.
translation.it: Non verrai punita se mi dici la verità.

translation.en: Well, you are, because you've drawn in a library book.
translation.it: Invece sì, perché hai disegnato sul libro.

translation.en: I don't understand what's going on with you lately, Mia.
translation.it: Non so cosa ti stia prendendo, Mia.

translation.en: Why do you need to see Joan?
You never even met her till yesterday.
translation.it: Non l'avevi mai vista prima di ieri.

translation.en: She says she loves me and I belong to her.
translation.it: Dice che mi vuole bene e che le appartengo.

translation.en: You don't belong to her. You… [inhales sharply] You don't even know her.
translation.it: Non le appartieni. Non la conosci nemmeno.

translation.en: She's sick, Bunny. She doesn't know who you are.
translation.it: È malata, piccola. Non sa chi sei.

translation.en: She doesn't know who I am. She doesn't know who anyone is.
translation.it: Non sa chi sono io. Non riconosce più nessuno.

translation.en: She does know who I am.
-I'm going to see her. -No, you're not.
Bunny, you are going to sleep.
[Mia whispering] You're not my real mummy.
translation.it: Non sei la mia vera mamma.

translation.en: Uh, no. Uh, no, he's not.
Okay, um, could you just let him know that I called?
translation.it: Ok, puoi dirgli che ho chiamato?

translation.en: Just need to run a few things past him.
translation.it: Devo solo parlargli di alcune cose.

translation.en: I mean, I'm… I'm always here, if you need to talk.
translation.it: Se hai bisogno di parlare, io ci sono sempre.

translation.en: Hey, I'm sorry about what happened with Toby.
translation.it: Mi dispiace per quello che è successo con Toby.

translation.en: I-- I completely understand why you lost your temper.
translation.it: Capisco perché hai perso le staffe.

translation.en: It's been really hard for you with your father's passing and…
translation.it: So che la morte di tuo padre è stata un brutto colpo e…

translation.en: Pete mentioned it might have brought up all that stuff from before
translation.it: Pete mi ha detto che potrebbe averti ricordato i trascorsi

translation.en: I can't imagine what it must have been like.
You're a good… You're a good girl.
-[Pete over phone] Sarah. -[Sarah] What the fuck did you tell her?
translation.it: - Sarah! - Cosa cazzo le hai detto?

translation.en: [Pete sighs] I thought it was important that she know.
She understands, you know, trauma, family stuff.
translation.it: Capisce i traumi, le storie familiari.

translation.en: She understands nothing. She doesn't need to understand anything.
translation.it: Non capisce niente. E non deve capire niente.

translation.en: -It has nothing to do with her. -Okay. Okay.
Because the school called me, and they said they've spoken to you too.
translation.it: La scuola mi ha chiamato, so che hanno parlato anche con te.

translation.en: She-- [sighs] She wanted-- She wanted to see Joan again.
-No. Pete, it's-- -Sarah, it'll be all right.
translation.it: - No. Pete, è… - Sarah, andrà tutto bene.

translation.en: Take Mia, show her the house, clear it out, and pack it up.
translation.it: Mostra la casa a Mia e sgomberala del tutto.

translation.en: -Put a fucking lid on it. -No, Pete--
Sarah, let Mia have a relationship with her grandma.
translation.it: Sarah, lascia che Mia abbia un rapporto con sua nonna.

translation.en: -Come back from where? -From where they go when they die.
translation.it: - Tornare da dove? - Da dove va quando muore.

translation.en: Grandpa said he would come back as a pelican.
translation.it: Nonno diceva di volere tornare da pellicano.

translation.en: It was our little secret. He said he wanted to keep an eye on you.
translation.it: Era un nostro piccolo segreto. Diceva che voleva tenerti d'occhio.

translation.en: No, this is where I lived when I was little.
translation.it: È dove ho vissuto da piccola.

translation.en: [Mia] Hey, I'm gonna sleep in here.
No, it's not. Come on, I don't wanna be in here.
translation.it: No, invece. Su, non voglio restare qui.

translation.en: Uh-- Because I don't! Come on.
But I like it in here.
Come on, out. Get out. I don't want to--
translation.it: Forza, esci da qui. Non voglio…

translation.en: -No. -I don't want to be in here. Get out.
translation.it: - No. - Non voglio stare qui. Esci.

translation.en: Can you draw me one after?
Before Grandpa and I moved to the city.
translation.it: Prima di andare in città col nonno.

translation.en: I don't like to talk about it.
I said I don't want to talk about it, Mia.
translation.it: Ho detto che non voglio parlarne.

translation.en: Mia, I need you to tell me if someone has said something to you.
translation.it: Mia, devi dirmi se qualcuno ti ha detto qualcosa.

translation.en: Denise… maybe? Or-- or your dad?
If someone has said something to you about Alice.
translation.it: Se qualcuno ti ha detto qualcosa su Alice.

translation.en: Please. [shudders] Mia, this isn't a game.
translation.it: Per favore. Mia, non è un gioco.

translation.en: Tell me if someone has said something to you that they shouldn't have.
translation.it: Ti hanno detto cose che non avrebbero dovuto dirti?

translation.en: -It is not fun-- -[loudly] I'm Alice! I'm Alice! I'm Alice!
Mia, look, I know you don't understand, but it really hurts Mummy…
translation.it: Mia, so che non lo capisci, ma fa molto male alla mamma…

translation.en: [Sandy] Looking forward to seeing your grandma?
translation.it: - Non vedi l'ora di vedere la nonna? - Sì.
- Non vedi l'ora di vedere la nonna? - Sì. Bene. Ci siamo, è nella prima a destra.

translation.en: -Mia. Mia. -I'll be here if you need me.
Oh, we were here before, and you didn't recognize me.
translation.it: Siamo già venute ma non mi hai riconosciuto.

translation.en: I've been wanting to meet you for such a very, very long time.
translation.it: Era da tanto che volevo conoscerti.

translation.en: Albert told me all about you, little Mia.
translation.it: Albert mi ha parlato tanto di te, piccola Mia.

translation.en: -[Sarah] Uh, Mia. -[Mia] You called me Alice.
-My name is Alice. You said-- -We're gonna go. Come on.
translation.it: - Sono Alice. L'hai detto… - Andiamo. Su.

translation.en: -Why don't you remember me? -[Sarah] Mia, come on.
[Mia] Can you tell me about her?
She had, uh… dark hair and freckles.
translation.it: Aveva i capelli scuri e le lentiggini.

translation.en: She'd, um… She'd find animals and bring them home and look after them.
translation.it: Quando li trovava, li portava a casa e si prendeva cura di loro.

translation.en: No. Dogs. And… found a bird once.
translation.it: No. Cani. E una volta trovò un uccello.

translation.en: My dad used to catch wild rabbits.
translation.it: Mio padre catturava i conigli selvatici.

translation.en: I used to help him check the traps, but she didn't like that.
translation.it: Lo aiutavo con le trappole, ma a lei non piaceva.

translation.en: I don't like hide-and-seek. You don't look for me.
translation.it: Nascondino non mi piace. Tu non mi cerchi.

translation.en: You make me hide and hide and hide.
You don't want to find me. You lock me in.
translation.it: Non vuoi trovarmi. Tu mi chiudi dentro.

translation.en: [voicemail] You've called Pete. I can't take your call at the moment. So leave a message.
translation.it: Sono Pete. Ora non posso rispondere. Lasciate un messaggio.

translation.en: I don't know if you or Denise had said something to Mia,
translation.it: Non so se tu o Denise avete detto qualcosa a Mia,

translation.en: And for whatever fucking reason, she's pretending to be her.
translation.it: E per qualche cazzo di motivo finge di essere lei.

translation.en: So if you could call me back, um…
I don't… I don't feel good, Pete.
I want to sell the house.
I'll pay for this place, this facility. You can stay here.
translation.it: Pagherò io per questa struttura. Puoi restare qui.

translation.en: -I don't need-- -Dad asked me to before he died.
translation.it: - Non mi serve… - Me l'aveva chiesto papà.

translation.en: you still spoke, but I didn't know-- I didn't know all this.
translation.it: Vi parlavate ancora, ma io non sapevo di questo.

translation.en: Oh. [sighs] You don't need to sell the house.
I'm gonna go back there when I leave here.
translation.it: Tornerò lì quando uscirò da qui.

translation.en: It's what your father and I agreed.
translation.it: Ero già d'accordo con tuo padre.

translation.en: What do you think's gonna happen? She'll stroll through the door one day?
translation.it: Cosa pensi che succederà? Che un giorno varcherà quella porta?

translation.en: You've wasted your life waiting for her.
translation.it: Hai sprecato la tua vita ad aspettarla.

translation.en: I don't want to look at you. I can't stand the sight of you.
translation.it: Non voglio guardarti. Non sopporto la tua vista.

translation.en: I should never have left her with you. -She's not safe with you. -Ow!
translation.it: Non avrei mai dovuto lasciarla con te. Non è al sicuro con te.

translation.en: You never, ever do that again.
-Do you hear me? -I woke up and you weren't there.
translation.it: - Capito? - Mi sono svegliata da sola.

translation.en: I don't care. What if something had happened to you?
translation.it: Non m'importa. E se ti fosse successo qualcosa?

translation.en: And did you-- Did you put the pictures back up?
translation.it: E hai rimesso tu le foto a posto?

translation.en: -Did you go into the shed? -I didn't do anything.
translation.it: - Sei stata al capanno? - Non ho fatto nulla.

translation.en: Joan is not gonna come back here.
-So we need to pack everything up. -No!
You need to pack your things. I am taking you home tomorrow.
translation.it: Raccogli le tue cose. Domani ti porto a casa.

translation.en: I'm gonna have a shower. Just stay inside.
translation.it: Vado a farmi una doccia. Non uscire.

translation.en: Mia, what's happening? Mia, it's okay. It's okay, sweetheart.
translation.it: Mia, che succede? Va tutto bene.

translation.en: Stop, stop, stop, stop. You're having a nightmare.
-[Mia panting] -It's okay. You're having a nightmare.
translation.it: È tutto ok. Era un incubo, un brutto sogno.

translation.en: Sweetheart, it's just a dream. It's okay. You're all right.
translation.it: È tutto ok. Era un incubo, un brutto sogno. Va tutto bene. Stai bene.

translation.en: What's this? What's this? No, no.
-[Mia, loudly] What? -Let me see. Let me see.
-What? -Just let me see. I just need to--

translation.it: - Ti sei fatta male? - Cosa? Smettila.

translation.en: -Just hold still. I need to get in here. -Stop it.
-I need to see what you've done-- -Stop it!
-No. Mia, I need to-- -Stop. Please, Mummy.
translation.it: - Mia, devo… - No. Ti prego, mamma.
- Mi fai male! Fermati! - Mia, no…

translation.en: [crying] Please, let me in, Alice! Please, let me in, Alice!
Jesus, Sarah. Why haven't you been answering your phone?
translation.it: Gesù. Perché non rispondi al telefono?
- Lì dentro dove? Dove? - Lì dentro!
- Grazie a Dio! Tesoro. - Piccola, sei…

translation.en: [nurse] Sorry, you're not allowed to be in here.
translation.it: Mi scusi, non può stare qui.

translation.en: For the things I did to you.
translation.it: Per le cose che ti ho fatto.

translation.en: I told Mum you ran away.
translation.it: Ho detto a mamma che eri scappata.

translation.en: Because I didn't wanna tell her the truth.
